alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Coastal Cumberland; Sagadahoc (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 2:55PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Cumberland and central Sagadahoc Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 255 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Topsham, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brunswick, Bath, Topsham, Bowdoin, Bowdoinham, West Bath and Phippsburg. This includes Interstate 295 between mile markers 27 and 37. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
